contentList.content: Until no longer enraged, you may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WildMagicBarbarian_Teleport">Flamebreak</LSTag> once per turn.
Affected creature may cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WildMagicBarbarian_Teleport">Flamebreak</LSTag> once per turn until no longer enraged.
Teleport up to [1] to an unoccupied space you can see, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag> all enemies within [2].
Shadowy tendrils lash around you, draining the life from all enemies within [1].
Affected creature is surrounded by tendrils of wild shadow magic. Each turn they lash out, absorbing enemies <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> within [1].
Until no longer enraged, you may summon an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WildMagicBarbarian_ExplodingFlumph">Intangible Spirit</LSTag> each turn.
Affected creature can summon an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WildMagicBarbarian_ExplodingFlumph">Intangible Spirit</LSTag> each turn, until no longer enraged.
Summon a spectral flumph. The flumph explodes at the end of your turn, dealing [1] to each creature within [2].
Affected creature will explode at the end of its turn. Each creature within [1] must succeed a Dexterity based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or take [2].
Explode in a mess of arcane jelly.

Magic infuses your weapon. Until no longer enraged, it deals an additional [1] and gains the <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">Thrown</LSTag> property. Additionally, if thrown, your weapon will automatically return to you.

Affected weapon is infused with arcane magic.

Until the wielder is no longer enraged, it deals an additional [1] and gains the Thrown property. Additionally, if thrown, it will automatically return its wielder.
Until no longer enraged, arcane magic lashes out whenever you take damage, hitting your attackers in retaliation.
Affected creature is protected by a wild, arcane magic. Until no longer enraged, enemies that damage them take [1] in retaliation.
Until no longer enraged, protective multicoloured lights surround you and nearby allies, increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by 1.

Affected creature is protected by multicoloured lights. Until no longer enraged, the affected creature and any allies within [1] have a +1 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Affected creature is surrounded by barbarous wild magic, and has been granted a +1 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Until no longer enraged, shadowy vines burrow beneath you, making the ground <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> for anyone but you.

Affected creature is surrounded by shadowy vines. Until no longer enraged, the ground within [1] of them becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> for everyone other than them.
Until no longer enraged, you may fire a beam of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_WildMagicBarbarian_LightBolt">Barbaric Radiance</LSTag> from your chest each turn.
Affected creature may fire a beam of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_WildMagicBarbarian_LightBolt">Barbaric Radiance</LSTag> from their chest until no longer enraged.
Fire a beam of light from your chest that <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> your target.
You remain enraged until the end of your current combat encounter.
Affected creature will remain enraged until the end of their current combat encounter.

You shockingly increase in both size and musculature, vastly improving all of your physical capabilities, causing yourself to deal an additional [1] damage with all <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag> and while unarmed.

Affected creature has shockingly increased in both size and musculature, vastly improving all of their physical capabilities and causing them to deal an additional [1] damage with all <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attacks</LSTag> and while unarmed.
All enemies within [1] of you become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silenced</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silenced</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GREATER_INVISIBILITY">Greater Invisibility</LSTag> for three turns.
All enemies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GREATER_INVISIBILITY">Greater Invisibility</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you become a block of cheese for three turns.
All enemies within [1] of you become a block of cheese for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
All enemies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you suffer from <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
All enemies within [1] of you suffer from <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
All enemies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you suffer from <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
All enemies within [1] of you suffer from <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to all damage for three turns.
All enemies within [1] of you are afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLD_MONSTER">Hold Creature</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROZEN">Frozen</LSTag> solid.
For the next three turns, dealing damage will send your target flying backward by [1].
Affected creature will send their targets flying backward by [1] upon dealing damage.
For the next three turns, taking damage will send you flying backward by [1].
Affected creature will be sent flying backward by [1] upon taking damage.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
All enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you erupt in a violent explosion of fire.
Enemies within [1] of you erupt in a violent explosion of fire.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STONESKIN">Stoneskin</LSTag> for three turns.
Enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STONESKIN">Stoneskin</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> for three turns.
Enemies within [1] of you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> for three turns.
You summon allied zombies from all nearby corpses.

You and all allies within [1] are afflicted with a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CRAWLING_GNAW_SWITCH">Crawling Gnaw</LSTag> until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. No affect on Undead, Constructs, Elementals, Plants, or Ooze based creatures.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MIRROR_IMAGE_1">Mirror Image</LSTag> for three turns.
Enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MIRROR_IMAGE_1">Mirror Image</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENLARGE">Enlarge</LSTag> for three turns.
Enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENLARGE">Enlarge</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you suffer from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="REDUCE">Reduced</LSTag> for three turns.
Enemies within [1] of you suffer from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="REDUCE">Reduced</LSTag> for three turns.
Summon an allied feline familiar next to every ally within [1].
Summon a blazing bombadiers next to every ally within [1]. These bombadiers are hostile to all other creatures and cannot move on their own.
Characters within [1] of you take [2] damage for every 100 pieces of gold on their person.
Characters within [1] of you regain an additional +1d12 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> when healed.
Affected creature will regain an additional +1d12 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> when healed.
You and all allies within [1] of you will only roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Affected creature will only roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you will only roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Affected creature will only roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you can no longer roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Affected creature can no longer roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you can no longer roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Affected creature can no longer roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature has gained an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you gain an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature has gained an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature has gained an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> for three turns.
Affected creature has gained an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you suffer from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANE">Bane</LSTag> for three turns.
Enemies within [1] of you suffer from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANE">Bane</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Bless</LSTag> for three turns.
Enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS">Bless</LSTag> for three turns.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEATHER_FALL">Featherfall</LSTag> until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEATHER_FALL">Featherfall</LSTag> until their next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LONGSTRIDER">Longstrider</LSTag> until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LONGSTRIDER">Longstrider</LSTag> until their next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You and all allies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LONG_JUMP">Enhanced Leap</LSTag> until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you benefit from the effects of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LONG_JUMP">Enhanced Leap</LSTag> until their next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Doors and devices you approach will inexplicably lock themselves until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature seems to find that doors and devices they approach will inexplicably lock themselves.
Enemies within [1] of you will inexplicably lock themselves out of all nearby doors and devices until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature seems to find that doors and devices they approach will inexplicably lock themselves.
Doors and devices you approach will inexplicably unlock themselves until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature seems to find that doors and devices they approach will inexplicably unlock themselves.
Affected object has been magically unlocked.
Locked doors and devices you approach will inexplicably explode until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature seems to find that doors and devices they approach will inexplicably unlock themselves...in a very explosive manner.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain the ability to converse with animals until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Beasts within [1] of you erupt in flames, scorching themselves and everything around them.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain the ability to converse with the dead.
Corpses within [1] of you explode, dealing severe damage to any creatures nearby and sending them flying backward by [2].
Affected corpse has exploded, dealing severe damage to any creatures nearby and sending them flying backward by [1].
You and all allies within [1] of you gain the ability to read other creatures thoughts.
You are no longer capable of conversing with other creatures.
Affected creature is not capable of conversing with other creatures.
You and all allies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag> and may cast it without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Affected creature has gained <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag> and may cast it without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag> and may cast it without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Affected creature has gained <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MistyStep">Misty Step</LSTag> and may cast it without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
All creatures within [1] of you polymorph into either a cat or dog.
Casting a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> or Spell on another creature causes you to swap places with them.
Affected creature will swap places with their targets when casting a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> or Spell.
You and all allies within [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag> until the fire is doused.
Summon three allied Quasits until the end of your next combat encounter.
Being healed will ensure you never have to worry for your life again!
Affected creature will no longer worry about their life once healed!
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> until the next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag>.
Suffer from a -10 penalty in all <LSTag Tooltip="Skill">Skills</LSTag> until the next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature suffers from a -10 penalty in all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Become surrounded in a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESILIENT_SPHERE">Resilent Sphere</LSTag> until the end of your next turn.
Enemies within [1] of you become surrounded in a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESILIENT_SPHERE">Resilent Sphere</LSTag> until the end of their next turn.
A [1] flaming surface is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] flaming surface is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] frozen surface is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] frozen surface is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] acidic surface is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] acidic surface is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] pool of electirified water is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] pool of electirified water is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] greasy surface is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] greasy surface is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] cloud of magical darkness is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] cloud of magical darkness is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] muddy surface is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] muddy surface is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] pool of waste is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] pool of waste is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] pool of water is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] pool of water is conjured under all enemies within [2].
A [1] web surface is conjured under all allies within [2].
A [1] web surface is conjured under all enemies within [2].
